attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN ESSEX THERE IS ONLY ONE OR TWO CHARITIES THAT HELP THE HOMELESS, THE GOVERMENT SHOULD HELP THESE CHARITIES GET BIGGER AND HELP MORE PEOPLE. AT THE MOMENT I HELP HARP IN SOUTHEND BUT WE ARE 100% SELF SUPPORTING, PLEASE HELP OUR HOMELESS PEOPLE.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
